title: The history of video football
author: VD
content_html:
The Sports Guy was an Intellivision man, naturally. This may be the greatest interview ever recorded in the history of Man.

The six new entrants in the VPFL will be:

1) Zek, 2) Huck, 3) Jeanne, 4) Josh, 5) Jim Jewell 6) Hold the Sky. I will post the rosters of the six teams later today, Zek gets first pick, Huck second and so forth. Either pick your team in the comments after the person before you has selected or let me know that you won’t be playing. Remember, you are allowed four keepers. East Mesa, Burns and Greenfield should let me know who their keepers will be.
